name: Wheel of Fortune (itch)
description:
A visual novel experience from Takujin software.

Step into the socks and sandals of a 28 year-old N.E.E.T. living deep in the Balkan peninsulla as an unexpected situation forces you to change your basement-dwelling ways or suffer the consequences of your spineless lifestyle. Is your horrible luck finally turning or  will living with your parents somehow become even more terrible?  Will your newfound determination be enough to overturn a decade of regrets? Only you have the power to turn the  Wheel of Fortune! 

Featuring:

  • three waifus
  • seven endings
  • a Balkan setting
  • sampled folk music as BGM (works surprisingly well)
  • English gameplay so everyone can understand (Can even be played by Albanians and Slovenians!!)

A satirical (and slightly depressing) parody coming soon™ 

For information and updates follow us on social media:
twitter.com/takujinsoftware
fb.com/takujinsoftware

Želite pričat s Vašom waifu dok u pozadini svira narodna muzika?

Dosta Vam je japanskih pizdarija i oćete nešto više relateable?

Nemate posal, živite sa starcimai planirate pobić u Njemačku?

Isprobajte Wheel of Fortune, prvi balkanski visual novel!

uključuje:

  • mjesto radnje na balkanu
  • semplirane narodnjake kao BGM (funkcionira iznenađujuće dobro)
  • gameplay na engleskom tako da cili Balkan  razumi (Mogu igrat čak i Albanci i Slovenci!)
  • tri žene
  • sedam endinga

Za updateove i informacije pratite nas na društvenim mrežama!
